title: Sometimes forge test  crashes with the following error
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [ ] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (08a629a 2023-06-03T00:04:22.625130135Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

 forge test  --match-contract  LessonTwelveTest  -vvvv

### Operating System

Linux

### Describe the bug

```js

2023-06-11T09:28:27.663088Z ERROR sharedbackend: Failed to send/recv `basic` err=GetAccount(0xe82843f84a2695c4918e597d900262fffe57e81b, 
(code: -32000, message: missing trie node 98e394000ddb8c4c33158df3ee834e3df557b008ed5131fdd71d7f1fb624068d (path ) <nil>, data: None)) address=0xe82843f84a2695c4918e597d900262fffe57e81b
2023-06-11T09:28:28.906483Z ERROR sharedbackend: Failed to send/recv `basic` err=GetAccount(0xe82843f84a2695c4918e597d900262fffe57e81b, 
(code: -32000, message: missing trie node 98e394000ddb8c4c33158df3ee834e3df557b008ed5131fdd71d7f1fb624068d (path ) <nil>, data: None)) address=0xe82843f84a2695c4918e597d900262fffe57e81b
The application panicked (crashed).
Message:  called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value
Location: /home/runner/.cargo/git/checkouts/revm-bf744d8ffabcbad9/4e6750b/crates/revm/src/journaled_state.rs:133

This is a bug. Consider reporting it at https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry

Backtrace omitted. Run with RUST_BACKTRACE=1 environment variable to display it.
Run with RUST_BACKTRACE=full to include source snippets.
```
```js
2023-06-11T09:56:49.780703Z ERROR sharedbackend: Failed to send/recv `basic` err=GetAccount(0x3ad9f29ab266e4828450b33df7a9b9d7355cd821, 
(code: -32000, message: missing trie node 98e394000ddb8c4c33158df3ee834e3df557b008ed5131fdd71d7f1fb624068d (path ) <nil>, data: None)) address=0x3ad9f29ab266e4828450b33df7a9b9d7355cd821

Running 1 test for test/LessonThirteenTest.sol:LessonThirteenTest
[FAIL. Reason: backend: failed while inspecting: Database(GetAccount(0x3ad9f29ab266e4828450b33df7a9b9d7355cd821, 
(code: -32000, message: missing trie node 98e394000ddb8c4c33158df3ee834e3df557b008ed5131fdd71d7f1fb624068d (path ) <nil>, data: None)))] testSolve() (gas: 0)
Traces:
  [27171] LessonThirteenTest::setUp() 
    ├─ [0] VM::createSelectFork(arb, 99972157 [9.997e7]) 
    │   └─ ← 0
    ├─ [0] VM::addr(<pk>) [staticcall]
    │   └─ ← Usr: [0x40BbC7331c650BaD27797D6B060B4FdB5f1C9C92]
    ├─ [0] VM::label(Usr: [0x40BbC7331c650BaD27797D6B060B4FdB5f1C9C92], Usr) 
    │   └─ ← ()
    ├─ [0] VM::deal(Usr: [0x40BbC7331c650BaD27797D6B060B4FdB5f1C9C92], 1000000000000000000 [1e18]) 
    │   └─ ← ()
    └─ ← ()

Test result: FAILED. 0 passed; 1 failed; finished in 8.21s

Failing tests:
Encountered 1 failing test in test/LessonThirteenTest.sol:LessonThirteenTest
[FAIL. Reason: backend: failed while inspecting: Database(GetAccount(0x3ad9f29ab266e4828450b33df7a9b9d7355cd821, 
(code: -32000, message: missing trie node 98e394000ddb8c4c33158df3ee834e3df557b008ed5131fdd71d7f1fb624068d (path ) <nil>, data: None)))] testSolve() (gas: 0)
```
Hey! Thanks. Could you provide a repro for this so we can look into it? It's difficult to track the bug without knowing what code pattern causes this issue.
